body_html: I agree that the tf.summary API has room for improvement regarding convenience. We're trying to move towards tf.contrib.summary and eventually tb.summary at this time. We sadly don't have resources to do feature work on this older API at this time.
body_text: I agree that the tf.summary API has room for improvement regarding convenience. We're trying to move towards tf.contrib.summary and eventually tb.summary at this time. We sadly don't have resources to do feature work on this older API at this time.
body: I agree that the `tf.summary` API has room for improvement regarding convenience. We're trying to move towards `tf.contrib.summary` and eventually `tb.summary` at this time. We sadly don't have resources to do feature work on this older API at this time.
